title: Create a connection
description: Creates a new connection resource. Connections are used by BigQuery to run federated queries against external data sources.

objective.narrative: This sample demonstrates creating a connection to an external data source. This is a prerequisite for running federated queries from BigQuery, which lets users analyze data in place without needing to move it into BigQuery storage.

regionTags.name: bigqueryconnection_v1_connectionservice_connection_create
regionTags.title: Create a connection
regionTags.description: Creates a new connection resource. Connections are used by BigQuery to run federated queries against external data sources.
